Participate reading through all the tutorial information- they say “the translation feature is really neat & could be very helpful.”

Participants says the pairing issues were frustrating & would have called tech support. Resetting the band was frustrating. Said they felt like it took longer than 15 seconds & had to push harder than expected to have it reset.
Participate playing hyper trail: found a new way to control the ball by swiping fingers left and right. Says they noticed slight lag between some of her movements.
Participants says when she does the “thumb movements” aren’t responding. But the movements they’re trying respond better than the ones in the tutorial
They say the ball is moving further than they want to go. They’re a gamer and not letting them do the movement they want to play the game.
They say the movements work better if the move their had. Also says it’s glitchy. Glasses opened the Home Screen twice as they’re playing the game, they say “ it’s confusing to get back to the game.”

They’ve tried 6-7btimes using the menu to get back to the game. Keep getting error messages. Tried asking Meta & 1) meta said they couldn’t help with that asked again 2) were told they need pair the games app to the glasses. Double checked the phone and the app was on the phone
Feels like they are forgetting the had movements & would like a visual of each gesture on an instructions page.
They say the game is fun & playing it with their hands is unique experience
They say using the hand movements are more fun than swiping on the phone

Controlling the game is becoming the more intuitive 
Moving side to side is responding as expected 
Moving up and down is glitching and difficult
Says it’s difficult to go up. Says the down motion paired with moving their hand downward helps, but that hack doesn’t work moving upwards
They say it’s more engaging playing with their hand than a phone game
